meanings: [명사] joke, [동사] joke, (S) kid, tell[make, crack] a joke, (기분 나쁘게) (informal) make a crack

vlive.korean: 농담한 거예요? You just made a joke? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자가 직진하는 이유 [나의 이름에게] - EP.04
그럴 수도 있어요 - 이 정도의 농담도? They might... - This much of a joke too? 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #21
vlive.english: They might... - This much of a joke too?

vlive.korean: [농담] 강율 왜 이렇게 인기 없는 거야! [Kidding] Kang Yul, why are you not popular? 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울여자상업고등학교 ep5.(홍현희X정세운X강율)
vlive.english: [Kidding] Kang Yul, why are you not popular?

vlive.korean: [농담이고] 노래 한 곡 끝날 때마다 말씀 편히... [It was a joke] After we sing, let's talk. 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP31 #대망의마지막연습 #컨디션난조 #위기의첸
vlive.english: [It was a joke] After we sing, let's talk.

vlive.korean: 기가 막혀 - 아니 오늘 다들 무슨 농담이 아주... So floored. - Everyone's so good with the jokes today. 듣기 View video ITZY : 있지 in LA♥️
vlive.english: So floored. - Everyone's so good with the jokes today.

examples.korean: Listen, bud, enough of the wisecracks, OK? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이봐, 자네, 농담 그만해, 알았어? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Listen, bud, enough of the wisecracks, OK? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He came out with some good one-liners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 짧지만 재미있는 농담 몇 마디를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He came out with some good one-liners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We all groaned at his terrible jokes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모두 그의 끔찍한 농담에 끙 하고 앓는 소리를 뱉었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all groaned at his terrible jokes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He enjoyed exchanging banter with the customers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 고객들과 정감 어린 농담을 주고받기를 좋아했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He enjoyed exchanging banter with the customers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Such jokes tend to reinforce racial stereotypes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러한 농담은 인종에 대한 고정관념을 강화하는 경향이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Such jokes tend to reinforce racial stereotypes. Add to Wordbook
